March 29, 1948 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20, 4th £10. 14 bands competed.
Feb. 19, 2019, 1:12 p.m. Feb. 19, 2019, 1:24 p.m.
